definitions.definition: Manioc ( Manihot esculenta ), a tropical plant which is the source of tapioca .
Tapioca , a starchy pulp made with manioc roots .

main_definition: Manioc ( Manihot esculenta ), a tropical plant which is the source of tapioca .
secondary_definitions: Tapioca , a starchy pulp made with manioc roots .
